flavor_text: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on itshead. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.
Its pleasantly aromatic leaves have the abilityto check the hu midity and tem perature.
It loves to bask in the sunlight. It uses the leafon its head to seek out warm places.
In battle CHIKORITA waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However a sweet fragrance also waftsfrom the leaf becalming the battling Pokemon and creating a cozy friendly atmosphere all around.
